<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Adds the "field_decorations" attribute as a dictionary override for the Assignment group field on Change Request</description>
        <name>Change Success Score field decoration</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var CHANGE_SUCCESS_SCORE_MACRO = "change_success_score";

	var dictOverrideGr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary_override");
	dictOverrideGr.addQuery("name", "change_request");
	dictOverrideGr.addQuery("element", "assignment_group");
	dictOverrideGr.query();
	
	if (!dictOverrideGr.next()) {
		gs.log("\"Change Success Score field decoration\" fix script failed to find dictionary override record");
		return;
	}

	// if the dictonary override will be replaced on next upgrade then we've already loaded our update and so there's nothing to fix
	if (sn_collision.CollisionAPI.willBeReplacedOnUpgrade(dictOverrideGr))
		return;
	
	var attributes = new GlideAttributes(dictOverrideGr.getValue("attributes"));
	var attributeValue = attributes.getAttribute("field_decorations");
	if (attributeValue)
		attributeValue += ";" + CHANGE_SUCCESS_SCORE_MACRO;
	else
		attributeValue = CHANGE_SUCCESS_SCORE_MACRO;
	
	attributes.setAttribute("field_decorations", attributeValue);

	dictOverrideGr.setValue("attributes", attributes.serializeAttributes());
	dictOverrideGr.setValue("attributes_override", true);
	dictOverrideGr.update();
})();]]></script>
